item.description:
Interested in adding a few ducks to your backyard garden or permaculture system?  Join meetup member David Whitten for a small-group backyard duck skill-share and, for those who are interested, picking up Muscovy ducklings or ducks (see below). We will meet the ducks (of course) and discuss managing inputs and outputs in order to keep a happy little year-round flock while enhancing the health and fertility of your home ecosystem.

Topics such as housing, feed, breed selection and more will be covered.  Some of the benefits that ducks bestow on a system can include nutrient cycling, slug & snail control, eggs, meat, companionship and, well, more ducks if that's in your plan.

We’ve been keeping and breeding ducks for three years and have kept chickens for a few months now after a ten-year chicken hiatus.  We also raised turkeys two years in a row a little while back.  Please come share, learn and get some ducks.

Optional Moscovy Duck/Duckling Pickup:
We’re offering Muscovy (they're quackless!) Ducks and Ducklings for sale and they can be picked up at the event.  Ducklings are $5 each. Ducklings are mostly unsexed (can’t be sure your getting ducks or drakes).  If you want good breeding stock, we have two adult breeding trios we can configure and those can be picked up any time.  Breeding trios consist of one drake and two hens.  We’re offering these trios for $50.  If you think you're interested in going home with some ducks or ducklings, please indicate that when you RSVP; those orders will be filled first!


*Pls consult your town's zoning rules if you are uncertain about keeping ducks.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Skill-Share: Backyards Ducks (+ Optional Duck/Duckling Pickup)
